Articles.Content:
My new computer has been built, this is it\'s documentary build.

RAM Box:

![hni0026q.jpg](http://img806.imageshack.us/img806/4127/hni0026q.jpg)

RAM Sticks:

![hni0027x.jpg](http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/4048/hni0027x.jpg)

Case:

![hni0028a.jpg](http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3059/hni0028a.jpg)

Thermal Paste:

![hni0029n.jpg](http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/8629/hni0029n.jpg)

The CPU Fan Itself:

![hni0031z.jpg](http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/1498/hni0031z.jpg)

The Graphics Card:

![hni0032td.jpg](http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/422/hni0032td.jpg)

The Motherboard:

![hni0034.jpg](http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/9985/hni0034.jpg)

The Processor:

![hni0035s.jpg](http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/9095/hni0035s.jpg)

All Parts Together:

![hni0037b.jpg](http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/3419/hni0037b.jpg)

Graphics Card Logo:

![hni0042f.jpg](http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/2159/hni0042f.jpg)

The Finished Case:

![hni0044rv.jpg](http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/6541/hni0044rv.jpg)

Does it run alright?

I remeber I tried to build a tablet out of an old laptop when I was 10...

I failed... Bad, the touchscreen didn\'t work, it wouldn\'t charge, it didn\'t detect the RAM. Of course back then I couldn\'t be trusted to unplug anything without shocking myself.

> 
> Does it run alright?
> 
> I remeber I tried to build a tablet out of an old laptop when I was 10...
> 
> I failed... Bad, the touchscreen didn\'t work, it wouldn\'t charge, it didn\'t detect the RAM. Of course back then I couldn\'t be trusted to unplug anything without shocking myself.

It runs great. Runs Minecraft, Far render distance, Smooth lighting at 180 FPS

KSP is still to be tested.

I wish i had a gaming comp. Mines just a $500 laptop (Although its good in laptop standards) With a moniter hooked up. I call it gaming to impress my friends ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) jk

> 
> I wish i had a gaming comp. Mines just a $500 laptop (Although its good in laptop standards) With a moniter hooked up. I call it gaming to impress my friends ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) jk

The closest I have to a Gaming PC is an Acer aspire X1200...

We might need to replace the cooling fan. (It\'s a 3 or 4 year old PC.)

I also need to get WIN7 on it.

My processor never gets above 40 degrees Centigrade. My graphics card never gets above 165 degrees Fahrenheit. 

EDIT: KSP gets 60 FPS...ALL THE TIME, And the loading speeds in KSP are amazing.
Did you take those pics with a potato? ;P

> 
> Did you take those pics with a potato? ;P

No, I took them with my 3DS ;P

> 
> No, I took them with my 3DS ;P

Sweet. Do you have the 3D versions? I\'ll look at them on *my* 3DS.

> 
> Sweet. Do you have the 3D versions? I\'ll look at them on *my* 3DS.

I will put the 3D pictures up soon. Like they will be HD ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
